Name: Steam Piping - Small Diameter Threaded Steel - (2.5 inches in diameter or less), SDC D, E, or F, BRACING FRAGILITY

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing based upon 1000 ft segments of pipe, pipe 2.5 inches in diameter or less
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given

DamageStates.Description: Isolated support failure w/o leakage - 0.5 supports fail per 1000 feet of pipe (assuming supports every 20 feet)
